sent.orig: By comparison, Japan's largest aluminium firm, Furukawa-Sky Aluminum, produces a mere 427,000 tonnes a year.
sent.trans: 相比之下，日本第一大铝业公司古河电器工业株式会社铝业公司(Furukawa-Sky)年产量仅427，000吨。

sent.orig: SKY has three inference engines: object inference engine. rule set inference engine and method inference engine.
sent.trans: SKY拥有三部推理机：对象推理机、规则集推理机和方法推理机。

sent.orig: They also brought to English many words that begin with sk, like sky and skirt.
sent.trans: 他们也将许多以sk开头的词带到英语中来，如sky（天空）和skirt（裙子）。

sent.orig: Sky Broadband and Sky Talk are exclusive to Sky TV customers.
sent.trans: 天空宽带和天空谈话对天空电视顾客独占。

sent.orig: The sky looks black from the moon and you'll see earth up in the sky.
sent.trans: 从月球看天空是一片黑暗。而你可以看见地球高高的挂在天上。
